name: treasurerApp
description: Application to keep up with homegroup contributions

scripts.build: browserify -t brfs -e app/app.js -o public/js/app.js && cat node_modules/jquery/jquery.js > public/js/jquery.js && cat node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.js > public/js/bootstrap.js && cat node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css > public/css/bootstrap.css && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap/dist/fonts  public

author: Joel Villahermosa
